text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Good Gesture Mr. President Donald Trump. We are thankful to you & respected America's. Hope you will support to make the COVID19 Vaccine.
Take care to you & Lovely American.
God Bless you.
Love from India.
🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 🇮🇳
